result.execSummary:
The defendant Dominic Love was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Submit a DNA sample. Pay all costs and surcharges by 02-22-17 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
Concurrent with: Any sentence; TIME SERVED DISPOSITION

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dominic Love

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Dominic Love in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Defendant Dominic Love in custody.  Randy Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 2 days in the House of Correction CONCURRENT to any sentence with credit for 2 days served FOR A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.  Court ordered defendant to pay ALL COSTS and SURCHARGES by 02-22-2017 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.  Court ordered the defendant to submit a DNA sample.  Court advised the defendant of his appeal rights.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Attorney Neil Callahan Mcginn in court, defendant Dominic Love not in court, in custody.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  Defense counsel received discovery and offer.    Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 21.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 22, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dominic Love in court with attorney Neil Callahan Mcginn.  Defendant Dominic Love in custody.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  The defendant may be revoked by his probation/parole agent.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 21.  Status conference scheduled for February 10, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/DEFENDANT to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.
   Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.
  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

ADDRESS INFO for Dominic Love
Current: 4034 North 46th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216   (Effective: 01-02-2016)
Prior: 4034 North 46th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216

Defendant Dominic Love in court with attorney Angele R. Dentice.  Defendant Dominic Love in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 21.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 11, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
